text:
Good morning Mentor,

I've had some experience in the basics of coding in HTML and Visual <http://Basics.net|Basics.net>, however weren't as much in detail and have recently started Python.

As of now I don't have a concrete job in my mind but I'm greatly interested in science and technology where I have a greater support leaning towards the medical aspect, however despite that I do want to know more about the careers and pathways in computing and technology.
